snippet: The U.S. government offers no adequate method for people to challenge their placement on its no-fly list, a federal judge ruled Tuesday in a case involving 13 Muslims who believe they're on the list....

headline.print_headline: Judge: No-Fly List Violates Constitutional Rights
headline.main: Judge: No-Fly List Violates Constitutional Rights

lead_paragraph: The U.S. government offers no adequate method for people to challenge their placement on its no-fly list, a federal judge ruled Tuesday in a case involving 13 Muslims who believe they're on the list.
